name: Stephanie King Mattingly
what_you_do: Stephanie King Mattingly helps people intentionally unhide what they've been keeping secret so it no longer weighs them down or runs their lives, using her Letting Go Method™.
who_you_serve: People who are hiding secrets that are holding them back in their relationships, work, and personal life.
social_proof: Former television journalist; author of a book available at Barnes & Noble with book signings; featured on podcast appearances.
signature_programs: My Letting Go Method™; The Challenge What Holds You Back Podcast (host); book 'The Secret You Hide Holds You Back' (title inferred from interview headline)
business_focus: Helping individuals release hidden secrets through the Letting Go Method™ to live more authentically.
service_provided: mental wellness coaching, podcast hosting, speaking, book/author
